headline: Great Plains Communications Leverages Fortinet Technology to Provide Next-Generation Firewall Services for Small to Medium Sized Businesses
summary: Blair, Nebraska, Aug. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Great Plains Communications (GPC), the leading Midwestern telecommunications provider, today announced it will be leveraging Fortinet FortiGate Next-Generation Firewalls to deliver fully managed firewall and cybersecurity services. As small and medium-sized businesses increasingly rely on the public internet for mission-critical applications, GPC’s high-speed internet access paired with Fortinet’s advanced firewall protection, ensures secure, fa

headline: Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) Market Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Palo Alto Networks, Fortinet, and Broadcom Lead with AI-Driven Security, Integrated Platforms, & Scalable Enterprise Solutions
summary: The SASE Companies Quadrant provides a detailed analysis of the global SASE market, highlighting 47 industry leaders out of over 100 evaluated companies. Key drivers include supporting hybrid cloud environments, remote workforces, and numerous IoT devices, while organizations seek cost-effective alternatives to MPLS and IPsec VPNs. The demand for secure access to applications is increasing, driven by digital transformation, cloud-native apps, and edge computing. Leading the market are companies

headline: Fortinet: Why I'm Bullish On Long-Term Growth As Cloud And AI Drive Value
summary: Fortinet keeps growing its recurring revenue and profit, leads in cloud security, and has a strong cash position. See why FTNT stock is a Buy.
